info.description:
API Description

### Contact Information

1. Dana Akesh

2. Baker Al-Sdeeq Dwaikat
   - Email: [bakerdwaikat02@gmail.com](mailto:bakerdwaikat02@gmail.com)


Contact Support:
 Name: Burble Productions
 Email: burble_productions@gmail.com
